UserFactory.LoginOption} [loginOption=true] The default keeps the user logged in over multiple sessions

The OAuth login endpoint of the salesforce server

Optional redirect

redirect: undefined | string
  • Defined in lib/binding/UserFactory.ts:393

[redirect=""] if set this changes the oauth behaviour to redirect mode, i.e. this site is closed to open the providers login page. Once the login is finished this redirect url will be opened with the logged-in user's token attached.

[scope="email"] the range of rights requested from the user
